io.github.mrblobman.spigotcommandlib

Annotation Type SubCommandHandle


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface SubCommandHandle
    Marks the annotated method as a method that handles sub command executions. All annotated methods should reside in a class that implements SubCommandHandler.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String description
      A short description about what this command does.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] command
      Specifies the sub command that this method handles.
      java.lang.String permission
      Specifies the permission required by the executer to successfully execute this sub command.

    • Element Detail

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        A short description about what this command does.
        Returns:
        the description

      • command

        public abstract java.lang.String[] command
        Specifies the sub command that this method handles. Ex: /baseCommand subCmd1 subCmd2 = new String[] {"baseCommand|baseAlias1", "subCmd1|alias1|alias2", "subCmd2"}
        Returns:
        a string array containing the full sub command that this method handles
        Default:
        {}

      • permission

        public abstract java.lang.String permission
        Specifies the permission required by the executer to successfully execute this sub command. Ex: my.subcommands.permission
        Returns:
        the String representation of the required permission
        Default:
        ""
